name: Generative NLP: LSTM vs Markov Chains
objective: Build the Markov Chains in Python using the given nusery rhymes dataset for training to create new nusery rhymes. Do the same with an LSTM model from Keras / TensorFlow, and compare results.
modelsAndConcepts: LSTM, Markov Chains, Generative Model, NLP, Language Processing

name: Keras Regularization Experiments on CNN models using the CIFAR-10 dataset
objective: Conducted a series of experiments with Jupyter notebook on CNN Models trained on the CIFAR-10 dataset to see how hyperparameters affect the model's performance.
modelsAndConcepts: CNN, Keras, TensorFlow, Max Pooling, Dropout, Max Norm, CIFAR-10

name: Neural Network for classifying heart disease.
objective: Using a patient dataset from Kaggle, built a Sequential Neural Network Model using Keras and TensorFlow to classify if a patient has heart disease or not.
modelsAndConcepts: Neural Network, Keras, TensorFlow, Sequential Model, pandas
